mapper.sql: id, product_id , commission_rate, commission_type , user_id , shop_id , create_time, is_delete, is_use
mapper.select:
select
from t_mall_seller_join_product jp left join t_mall_product p on p.id=jp.product_id where jp.user_id = #{busUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.is_publish=1 AND p.check_status=1 AND p.is_delete=0 and jp.is_delete=0 and jp.is_use=1

select jp.id, jp.product_id, jp.commission_rate, jp.commission_type, jp.user_id, jp.shop_id, jp.create_time, jp.is_delete, jp.is_use, c.image_url as imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url as specImageUrl,p.is_specifica as isSpecifica,p.pro_name as proName ,if(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) as proPrice,p.pro_stock_total as proStockTotal from t_mall_seller_join_product jp left join t_mall_product p on jp.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON jp.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON jp.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id where jp.id = #{id}

select
from t_mall_seller_join_product jp where jp.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and jp.is_delete=0 and jp.is_use=1

SELECT COUNT(sp.id) FROM t_mall_seller_join_product jp LEFT JOIN t_mall_seller_product sp ON sp.`product_id`=jp.`product_id` WHERE jp.product_id = #{productId} AND sp.`sale_member_id`=#{saleMemberId} AND jp.is_delete=0 AND sp.`is_delete`=0 and jp.is_use=1

SELECT distinct p.id as id,p.shop_id,p.is_member_discount,p.pro_price,p.pro_name,p.is_specifica,c.image_url,e.specifica_img_url,d.inv_num,d.inv_price,p.change_integral,p.pro_cost_price,p.change_fenbi,p.pro_label,p.pro_type_id,p.member_type,p.`shop_id` FROM t_mall_seller_join_product sp LEFT JOIN t_mall_product p ON p.id=sp.`product_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url FROM t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON p.id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price FROM t_mall_product_inventory WHERE is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON p.id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id WHERE sp.`is_delete`=0 AND p.`is_delete`=0 AND p.is_publish=1 AND p.check_status = 1 AND p.id > 0 AND sp.`product_id`=#{proId}
and p.user_id = #{busUserId}

select DISTINCT a.id AS id,a.shop_id,a.is_member_discount,a.pro_price,a.pro_name,a.is_specifica,d.inv_num,d.inv_price,a.change_integral,a.pro_cost_price,a.change_fenbi,a.pro_label,a.pro_type_id,a.member_type,a.user_id from t_mall_seller_join_product jp left join t_mall_product a on a.id=jp.product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price FROM t_mall_product_inventory WHERE is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON a.id=d.product_id
LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_group pg ON pg.product_id=a.id AND pg.is_delete=0 LEFT JOIN t_mall_group g ON g.id=pg.group_id AND g.is_delete=0
where jp.user_id = #{busUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and jp.is_delete=0 and jp.is_use=1 AND a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0
and pg.group_id =#{groupId}
and (a.pro_name like '%${proName}%' or g.group_name like '%${proName}%')
ORDER BY IF(d.inv_price>0 ,d.inv_price,a.pro_price )
desc
ORDER BY a.pro_sale_total+a.sales_base desc
ORDER BY a.change_fenbi desc
ORDER BY a.id desc
limit #{firstNum},#{maxNum}

select count(a.id) from t_mall_seller_join_product jp left join t_mall_product a on a.id=jp.product_id
LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_group pg ON pg.product_id=a.id AND pg.is_delete=0 LEFT JOIN t_mall_group g ON g.id=pg.group_id AND g.is_delete=0
where jp.user_id = #{busUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and jp.is_delete=0 and jp.is_use=1 AND a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0
and pg.group_id =#{groupId}
and (a.pro_name like '%${proName}%' or g.group_name like '%${proName}%')
